document_data.name: Randelo
document_data.mainbody: '''Randelo''' was a Watch captain and [[Purple Dragon knight]] in [[Suzail]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Randelo questioned the nobleman [[Arclath Delcastle]] and the [[coinlass]] [[Amarune Whitewave]] in the aftermath of the murder near her home, one morn in [[Mirtul]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}. Luckily, despite his suspicions, a watchman had been following them all night, and vouched for the fact they had taken no part in the murder.
